3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Minimal perspective distortion is present, but overall 3D conversion is excellent. Wall corners are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Door in Bedroom 2 is missing. All other walls, rooms, and openings are accurately represented.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture and fixtures are present and correctly placed. Furniture scale is reasonable. A closet in the hall is missing furniture.

visual_clarity.notes: Clear, well-lit, and aesthetically pleasing with consistent materials. No text labels or artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Door leading into Bedroom 2 from the main hall is missing.
Closet in the hall is empty, while it has a shelf/rod in the 2D plan.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been converted into an excellent and geometrically faithful 3D isometric cutaway model with high accuracy and visual clarity, despite a minor missing door and a detail in the closet.
